title: Donna LaVan Ripple Obituary - Chattanooga Times Free Press
content:
Donna LeVan Ripple, 83, passed away peacefully, Monday, December 26, 2022. She was born in Chattanooga, she later moved to Pelham, Tenn. and then returned to Chattanooga and graduated from a local business college. She was an artist and in her earlier years she was active in the Chattanooga art community. She was a former member of the Valamont Women’s Club and the Civic Arts League. She previously attended New Bethel Baptist Church, Harrison Tenn. She was predeceased by her husband, Robert E Ripple; parents, Lucille LeVan Trew and Woodrow LeVan Sr.; brothers, Woodrow LeVan Jr and H. Clinton LeVan II. Survivors include her son, Rob Ripple; step-daughter, Robin Godsey; sister, Sue Lynn Fults; grandchildren, Corey and Lillee Ripple; great-grandchildren, Chloe and Nevaeh Ripple; nephew, Jeffrey Fults. The Reverend Dwight Henderson will conduct a memorial service on Monday, February 13, 2023 at 12:30 p.m. at Chattanooga National Cemetery. Arrangements entrusted to Covenant Funeral & Crematory, Crox family owned and operated, www.CovenantFuneral.com.

Published February 5, 2023

title: Self-proclaimed Bitcoin creator calls XRP fans a 'cultist army,' labels Ripple a complete fraud - Finbold - Finance in Bold
content:
Craig Wright, a computer scientist and self-proclaimed Bitcoin (BTC) creator, has extended his criticism of the Ripple ecosystem and its backers.

In particular, Wright has called the XRP fans a ‘cultist army,’ claiming that the community knows the token will end up as a pyramid scheme at a time Ripple is currently in a legal dispute with the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), he said in a tweet on February 4.

Wright made the statement suggesting that the XRP fans closely follow a case between his firm Tulip Trading against 16 developers. In the case, the court ruled it should go to trial in London. The developers are accused of having ‘fiduciary duties’ and ‘duties in tort’ to re-write or amend protocol code, seeking to give Wright access to 111,000 Bitcoin.

“There is a reason why the XRP cultist army is following the Tulip Trading case so closely. They completely understand that this will end the pyramid scheme that is Ripple and XRP,” he said.

According to Wright, he projects an XRP wipeout over what he termed as a ‘fraudulent scheme.’

I have.



It is now because of Davey taking down the Ponzi that is XRP and ensuring that this complete fraudulent system is utterly wiped out — Dr Craig S Wright (@Dr_CSWright) February 4, 2023

Furthermore, Wright questioned the authenticity of the general Ripple project as the platform moves to power cross-border transactions.

yes, ripple lies to you



These guys did a project that ripple paid them for — Dr Craig S Wright (@Dr_CSWright) February 4, 2023

Craig’s terms Ripple a ‘bad joke’

Wright also termed XRP a ‘bad joke’ and maintained that the asset should not be classified as a cryptocurrency but as a scam. Notably, he has been involved in several Twitter altercations with the Ripple community, where he has questioned the viability of XRP.

As reported by Finbold, the self-proclaimed Satoshi Nakamoto termed XRP as a ‘useless pump and dump scheme.’

The talk about Ripple comes as the crypto industry awaits the outcome of the Ripple and SEC case. Both parties have made final submissions, and legal experts are sharing their overview of the case. For example, law professor J.W. Verret accused the SEC of treating Ripple like a Ponzi scheme.

Craig Wright controversies

Meanwhile, Wright has been embroiled in controversy regarding his identity as Satoshi Nakamoto, the anonymous founder of Bitcoin.

The controversy has extended outside crypto circles, with reports alleging that a large section of his PhD thesis was plagiarized. At the same time, a federal court in West Palm Beach, Florida, ruled that he must pay $43 million to a joint venture he co-founded for illegally seizing intellectual property.

Featured image via TEDx Talks.

title: Market Rebounds But Ripple (XRP) Fails To Rise Whilst ApeCoin (APE) And Orbeon Protocol (ORBN) Gain - Techpoint Africa
content:
The hardships of Ripple (XRP) still look intense as the project has failed to move into the green zone. However, ApeCoin (APE) and Orbeon Protocol (ORBN) have registered significant growth.

Orbeon Protocol (ORBN) is a new player in the crypto world, but it is set to grow massively during its presale round, which has already completed its four stages with a growth rate of 1400%.

>>BUY ORBEON TOKENS HERE<<

Ripple (XRP) Loses Battle To Bearish Sentiments

A recent report has revealed that Ripple’s (XRP) case with SEC might take some more time to come to a conclusion. This has made investors apprehensive about their future with Ripple (XRP). Besides, the collapse of FTX Token has also hurt the growth prospects of Ripple (XRP). With these negative sentiments surrounding it, Ripple (XRP) has witnessed a fall in its price. The price of Ripple (XRP) has declined by more than 12% in the last month. As a result, the current trading price of Ripple (XRP) has tumbled to $0.4003, which is 10.42% below its all-time high of $3.84.

Ripple (XRP) is a blockchain-powered digital payment network and protocol. The primary goal of Ripple (XRP) is to establish a payment settlement asset exchange and remittance system. Ripple (XRP) has partnered with many multinational financial institutions.

>>BUY ORBEON TOKENS HERE<<

ApeCoin (APE) Posts Positive Performance

Gaining a lot due to the buzz surrounding Web3 and NFTs, ApeCoin (APE) has witnessed a significant increase in its value. The price of ApeCoin (APE) has increased by 15% in the last seven days. Besides, ApeCoin’s (APE) price has inclined by 8% in the last month. Currently, ApeCoin (APE) is being traded at $5.97, which is 21.7% below its all-time high of $27.51.

ApeCoin (APE) runs an ecosystem that includes the Bored Ape Yacht Club and all other Yuga Labs items and services. The popularity of ApeCoin (APE) increased shortly after its release in March 2022 because of its association with the highly-successful BAYC project. ApeCoin (APE) emerged as a tool for individual investors to get in on the BAYC project without spending fortunes for BAYC NFTs.

>>BUY ORBEON TOKENS HERE<<

Orbeon Protocol (ORBN) Rides Faster On A Growth Unicorn

The fifth stage of Orbeon Protocol’s (ORBN) presale phase has started. At present, one ORBN token is available to purchase at $0.06, which was just $0.004 at the beginning of the first stage of the presale round. Orbeon Protocol (ORBN) is an investment platform revolutionizing the crowdfunding and venture capital industry. The platform was launched to help budding startups raise capital using blockchain. Orbeon Protocol (ORBN) mints fractional NFTs against stocks issued by companies, and people can become investors by purchasing them for as low as $1.

Through Orbeon Protocol (ORBN), businesses looking for funds can use the platform’s NFTs-as-service (NFTaas) to raise the required amount by issuing equity-based NFTs. Additionally, Orbeon Protocol (ORBN) has developed the “Fill or Kill” mechanism to protect investors from suffering losses. Orbeon Protocol’s (ORBN) “Fill or Kill” mechanism guarantees that all investors get their money back if the investment process falls apart abruptly. Moreover, Orbeon Protocol (ORBN) promises to list only real-world and properly scrutinized businesses on the platform.

All four elements of the Orbeon ecosystem - Orbeon Swap, Orbeon Wallet, Orbeon Exchange and Metaverse - are run by ORBN tokens. Orbeon Protocol (ORBN) holders will also receive added benefits, such as discounts on trading fees, voting rights, and cashback offers. Orbeon Protocol’s (ORBN) growth during the initial four stages of the presale phase was more than 1400%, and it is expected to explode by 6000% before the launch.
